review: I've had this for about a month now and use it regularly. The services that it supports are pretty limited and if it allowed the casting of my own videos, it would be even better. Thank goodness for the Google Cast Chrome browser add-in which is the way I primarily use this. I cast shows from xfinity (Comcast) that are available on-line (laptop or tablet), but not on demand via my DVR. It seems to work great.
